entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -14.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
